data.title: Courteney Cox Shared a Sweet Birthday Message For Jennifer Aniston, and My Heart Is Now Full
data.meta_description: PS makes wellness more accessible through real-life stories, first-person perspectives, and expert-backed information. Our staff of journalists and subject-matter experts research, report, and produce articles, videos, and social content that help people feel good about their well-being choices, no matter what they are. Via our core verticals — Health, Fitness, Beauty, Balance, Identity, and Shopping — we help our audience proceed with confidence.
data.text:
It looks like Courteney Cox and Jennifer Aniston have taken the Friends theme song lyrics to heart all these years, because they're still there for each other — even through milestone birthdays! Jennifer celebrated turning the big 5-0 with a star-studded shindig this past weekend, and Courteney couldn't resist giving her on- and offscreen pal an adorable shout-out on social media.

Monica Geller — er, I mean Courteney — shared a radiant selfie with her former costar, writing, "The world definitely got brighter the day this girl was born." Ain't that the truth! She added, "Happy birthday sweetheart! I Love you!" Needless to say, Friends fans flooded the comments with plenty of heart emoji and calls for a reboot of the popular sitcom. *Sigh* If only! Now, please excuse me while I binge-watch all the Thanksgiving episodes of Friends and frame this photo in honor of Jen's 50th.
